S

shuffle() - Method in class uno_cards.Deck
this shuffle function is intrinsic to a deck object and will randomly swap each card in the deck at least once
sortHand() - Method in class uno_cards.Hand
This function uses a double bubble sort to first sort cards by color then sort cards rank
